* Encapsulates exceptions that may be thrown when Bob runs.

* An exception which may be thrown when a desired file cannot be found.
* Returns a message to indicate that the file cannot be found.
* @return a message to indicate that the file cannot be found.

return "A key word or phrase was not provided. "

* An exception to be thrown when trying to access a file which does not exist.
* Returns a message to indicate that information could not be saved to a file.
* @return a message to indicate that information could not be saved to a file.
return "Sorry, but I had difficulty saving your information. Please try again.";
* An exception to be thrown when an incomplete deadline description is provided.

* @return a message that indicates the deadline description provided is incomplete, and the correct format.
return "The description for this deadline is incomplete. "
+ "Please remember to include a brief description alongside a due date.\n"
* An exception to be thrown when an incomplete event description is provided.

* @return a message that indicates the event description provided is incomplete, and the correct format.
return "The description for this event is incomplete. "

return "Please provide the index of a task on the list to mark it as done or to delete it.\n"

* An abstraction of commands which may be executed by Bob.
* Executes the command by updating the TaskList and Storage accordingly, and printing out
* the appropriate message from the UI.
* @param tasks the TaskList consisting of all tasks tracked by Bob.
* @param ui the UI which prints out all messages corresponding to the Command.
* @param storage the Storage which manages all saved data to be updated.
public abstract void execute(TaskList tasks, UI ui, Storage storage) throws BobException;
